text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Authority" means the Maryland Food Center Authority.
"Bond" means a bond, note, or any other obligation issued under this subtitle.

"Development" means:
the Center;
a commercial seafood development; and
any other multiproject food-related or agriculturally related real estate development that the Authority undertakes to further the purposes of this subtitle.

section.section: "Food" means agricultural and other edible food products and floricultural and horticultural products.
"Food" may be in packaged or fresh form.

text.section: "Improve" means to add, alter, construct, equip, expand, extend, improve, install, reconstruct, rehabilitate, remodel, or repair.
"Improvement" means addition, alteration, construction, equipping, expansion, extension, improvement, installation, reconstruction, rehabilitation, remodeling, or repair.

section.section: "Project" means a facility, operation, or portion of a development that the Authority undertakes to further the purposes of this subtitle.

"Project" includes:
a facility or service ancillary or appurtenant to a development or a project that the Authority determines will enhance the public convenience or attractiveness of the development or project, including:
land, structures, equipment, furnishings, rail or motor vehicles, barges, and boats in a development or project;
property and rights in a development or project; and
land and facilities that are functionally related to a development or project.
